headline: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (VRTX): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q2 Earnings?
summary: Over the past six months, Vertex Pharmaceuticals’s stock price fell to $413.23. Shareholders have lost 12.5% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 34.7%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
